universes.name: Forgotten Depths
universes.description: Sit down, my child, and listen close. The ocean is a wonder, the foaming waves that reach our peaceful shores a deceitful invitation. For what lies beneath that endless blue is a world beyond our imagining. Of kingdoms ruined and monsters fierce, floating down in those forgotten depths.

skinSets.name: Forgotten Depths
skinSets.description: Sit down, my child, and listen close. The ocean is a wonder, the foaming waves that reach our peaceful shores a deceitful invitation. For what lies beneath that endless blue is a world beyond our imagining. Of kingdoms ruined and monsters fierce, floating down in those forgotten depths.

universes.name: Galactic
universes.description: The War of the Broken Moon has ravaged our galaxy for near a hundred cycles. And still... there is no end in sight.

skinSets.name: Galactic
skinSets.description: The War of the Broken Moon has ravaged our galaxy for near a hundred cycles. And still... there is no end in sight.

universes.name: Glacial
universes.description: It is dangerous to venture out in the cold, for who knows what lurks within these frozen lands…

skinSets.name: Glacial
skinSets.description: The world is frozen, with few left to remember its cause. Old terrors stir from beneath the ice, ready to claim the world once more. The flame of hope remains, but the days are short, and the nights long…

universes.name: Lunar New Year
universes.description: It's time to look back, to celebrate with family and friends, to join together and remember all that has happened, the good and the bad. And as the fireworks light up the night sky, we look forward to a new year filled with wonderful memories with the ones we hold dear.

skinSets.name: Heavenscale
skinSets.description: In order to better know their kingdom's subjects, draconic royalty and retinue descend from their palace in the sky, taking on human forms and reveling with the mortals as they usher in the New Year.

skinSets.name: Lunar Beast
skinSets.description: Each year, a mischievous Lunar Beast arrives in the mortal realm, drawn to the New Year's celebrations. And each year, the corresponding Lunar God selects a squad of chosen champions to lead the beast on a merry chase and protect the city from the creature's playful rampage. The Lunar Parade is a beloved part of the New Year's festivities and the Beast itself brings good luck once it's been lulled to rest by the squad's efforts. When a Lunar Beast is well-entertained and well-rested, it always signals a prosperous New Year!

skinSets.name: Lunar Revel
skinSets.description: Join with friends and frenemies alike and celebrate the stories of the past year. Glowing lanterns touch the night sky, lit by fading fireworks. Red envelopes trade hands, families and clans that rarely meet rejoice in a shared acknowledgement: a new year beckons. May it be your best one yet!

skinSets.name: Lunar Revel: Firecracker
skinSets.description: The Lunar New Year has arrived—and so has the party! With food and festivities to spare, it's all about ringing it in with friends and family. Now strike up a match and watch the fireworks!

skinSets.name: Porcelain
skinSets.description: In a world where ancient spirits and magical creatures thrive in the periphery of modern society, powerful porcelain artifacts called the Zodiac Relics are key to unlocking immense power. They are kept safe by the Protectors: immortal guardians tasked with keeping the Relics out of the wrong hands.

universes.name: Order of the Lotus
universes.description: Tomes of Ionian myth speak of the venerable Order of the Lotus. Formed when mortals settled in the First Lands, the Order spent generations cultivating the secrets of immortality. Indeed, they were the only group to achieve the pure reincarnation of their spirits. As graceful and transient as ripples in the sea, Order of the Lotus disciples protect the First Lands without fear of facing this life or the next.

skinSets.name: Order of the Lotus
skinSets.description: Esteemed leaders and devoted acolytes in the Order of the Lotus are the finest of the First Lands. Avatars of immortality and virtue, members of the Order live many lifetimes, striving to keep peace eternal.

universes.name: PAX
universes.description: To those about to game, we salute you.

skinSets.name: PAX
skinSets.description: PAX: the intersection of all things gaming, where play is celebrated and immortal bonds are formed.

universes.name: Folded Edges
universes.description: A sedge of cranes glides through the sky, the canvas of sun and clouds a beautiful backdrop to their flight. The trees too, and the grass, are made of this self-same material, a parchment pressed with phenomenal power, forming this papercraft world.

skinSets.name: Papercraft
skinSets.description: Do you see a saddle on my back?" chirped the phoenix. "I am no pack-bird. And that yeti will weigh down our flight." The boy looked on, his perfect plan rejected. But then, a smile creased his face. After all, in this world of folded foliage and crinkled creeks, adventure is always just beyond the bend.

universes.name: Piltover Customs
universes.description: Looking for a souped-up ride? Look no further. (Mileage may vary.)

skinSets.name: Piltover Customs
skinSets.description: Looking for a souped-up ride? Look no further. (Mileage may vary.)

universes.name: The Badge
universes.description: In the criminal justice system, there are those who bend the law and those who break it. The dedicated officers at the RPD investigate the city's most heinous crimes to bring the worst offenders to justice. These are their stories...

skinSets.name: Riot
skinSets.description: In the criminal justice system, there are those who bend the law and those who break it. The dedicated officers at the RPD investigate the city's most heinous crimes to bring the worst offenders to justice. These are their stories...

universes.name: Highway Heretics
universes.description: In the radioactive ashes of the old world, wasteland warriors, vicious Vandals, and scrappy survivors war with one another for control over all that's left.

skinSets.name: Road Warrior
skinSets.description: Out in the wasteland, the only gospel a Road Warrior needs is the hum of an engine, and the only prayers they hear are the curses of their enemies.

skinSets.name: Vandal
skinSets.description: The Vandals loom large over the wasteland. They are a gang of violent thugs prone to mass destruction, brutal beatdowns, and wanton murder… but they sure have a good time doing it.

universes.name: Arclight
universes.description: Across the heavens and spanning all of creation, the Agents of Light wage an eternal battle against an unyielding darkness.

skinSets.name: Arclight
skinSets.description: Once each millenium an ancient, godlike entity descends from the heavens, choosing worthy warriors to be his will incarnate. These beings are the Arclight—immortal agents of the light divine.

skinSets.name: Justicar
skinSets.description: Standing tall within the Agents of Light are the Justicars, sentinels of the Arclight exemplifying its strongest virtues. It is not enough to serve as an example for only mortals, for even divine soldiers need inspiration.

universes.name: Soulstealer
universes.description: Souls are life, light, power—and in a world without mercy, they are stolen and consumed by remorseless masters of death.

skinSets.name: Soulstealer
skinSets.description: Souls are life, light, power—and in a world without mercy, they are stolen and consumed by remorseless masters of death.

universes.name: Super Galaxy
universes.description:
//EMERGENCY BROADCAST, ALL CHANNELS//
The Galaxy Threat Level has been raised to CRIMSON. [REDACTED] is under attack by [REDACTED]. HQ estimates [REDACTED] hours before total destruction, with collateral damage likely on neighboring systems. Super Galaxy ACTIVATE!

skinSets.name: Super Galaxy
skinSets.description: Space, the most dangerous frontier! Only the Super Galaxy Defense Force, with its seemingly endless supply of fresh academy recruits, is prepared to explore the farthest uncharted worlds and defend from the most ruthless alien threats. Best gig in the galaxy!

universes.name: Thunder Lord
universes.description: Mankind are not the only ones who fight bitter wars over petty squabbles. Once, before our time, two gods—two brothers—took up arms against each other, shaping the very land with the desolation of their battle.

skinSets.name: Thunder Lord
skinSets.description: Mankind are not the only ones who fight bitter wars over petty squabbles. Once, before our time, two gods—two brothers—took up arms against each other, shaping the very land with the desolation of their battle.

universes.name: Triumphant
universes.description: Rise to the competition and emerge triumphant!

skinSets.name: Triumphant
skinSets.description: Awarded to players who won a League of Legends sponsored tournament.

universes.name: Winter Sports
universes.description: Nothing brings out the best from competitive athletes like the prospect of getting a little frostbite.

skinSets.name: Winter Sports
skinSets.description: When the winter sports festival in question relaxed its rules, many assumed the event would become more exciting. But few realized just how dangerous it would become. Dangerously exciting that is!

universes.name: Zombie VS Slayers
universes.description: Brains...

skinSets.name: Zombies VS Slayers
skinSets.description: Brains...

universes.name: Neon Strata
universes.description: Few know of the Foreglow, and even fewer have seen its volatile neon flames. Normally a cosmic balancing force, something has tipped the scales, causing realms to collapse and funnel the Foreglow's power into single beings. Now known as Empyreans, these otherworldly forces of nature blaze a trail through the realms, each with their own agenda. The fire is spreading, with no end in sight.

skinSets.name: Empyrean
skinSets.description: The first Empyrean, Pyke, tears through the realms on a destructive rampage against his counterparts, birthing new Empyreans in the process. Who will reign supreme as these new powerhouses emerge, and what will they do with their rapidly dwindling time left?

universes.name: Tales of Borealis
universes.description: Have you heard the stories of the Aurora? Cold and dark they can be, but if you're brave enough you'll find warmth and majesty grander than any dream you've had. So sit yourself by the fire and come listen to these Tales of Borealis...

skinSets.name: Winterblessed
skinSets.description: When the air grows crisp and the first snow falls, look to the sky, for Polaris will appear. Do not be afraid, for if you've been virtuous without expectation, you might be rewarded with the Aurora's blessings. But remember: no matter how you act, you cannot take your fortunes for granted, because Polaris comes every year, and no one escapes punishment.

universes.name: Storycraft
universes.description: Stories, myths, legends: within each lies a world unto itself, where characters act out their trials and tribulations over and over as their tales are told and retold.

skinSets.name: Mythmaker
skinSets.description: Long ago, the defeat of the Great Beast Galio gave rise to Lunar New Year traditions that are carried on through the retelling of that epic tale. Within the story itself lies a living world all its own—but when the world of the story is suddenly interrupted, the characters must work together to fix the mess and see their own myth through.

universes.name: Lancer
universes.description: The ancient Lancers were marvels beyond compare in their time, built to protect the realm in its greatest hours of need. As time marches on and the giants sleep, the secrets of their construction have long since disappeared... but hope remains that they will answer the call.

skinSets.name: Lancer
skinSets.description: With the times growing dire, the great mechanized Lancers of old rouse from their slumber. Taller than any building and more powerful than any army, they rise to protect their subjects before returning to the earth once more.

universes.name: Battlecast
universes.description: The glorious revolution is here! Assembling an army of machines with living brains, Viktor marches against the combined forces of his enemies—with only a scrappy human-led resistance keeping him from total world domination.

universes.name: Fallen World
universes.description: When magic is lost, ash and despair reign in its stead. When the knights of that cursed order fall, what will rise in their place?

skinSets.name: Ashen Knights
skinSets.description: Many ages long past, a great king waged a glorious war: to break the shackles of magic on the world, so that mankind could forge its own destiny. Yet upon severing the final font of enchantment, the king was lost, the foundations of the world crumbled, and his once-legendary knights were left alone to madness, ruin, and ash.

universes.description: Between the rigid cliques, awkward group projects, and cheesy holidays, school was rough but routine. But getting lovestruck wasn't in the syllabus, and it's gonna make things way more complicated.

skinSets.name: Heartthrobs and Heartaches
skinSets.description: The preppy and perfectly poised Heartthrob clique don't have much in common with the Heartache crew, who would much rather be ditching class to hang out at the skatepark. But they agree on one thing: they've had it with this silly made up holiday dedicated to people catching feelings. So why can't they seem to shake the butterflies from their stomachs?

universes.name: Forsaken Hymn
universes.description: Within this ruined world of breaths and glass, where prayers go unanswered and vows are challenged, the only thing one can have faith in is this: a single breath can change one's life.

skinSets.name: Broken Covenant
skinSets.description: For years the Aspirant congregation has fought the Neverghaast sect over Aspira, the breath of life. To the congregation, Aspira is a gift one returns upon death to enter the afterlife. But the Neverghaast, cursed with an eternal thirst for breaths, believe there is only one life and it must be lived to excess. The war rages on, with no end in sight...

universes.name: Winged Reign
universes.description: Pixies, nixies, hobs, redcaps, and more call the Faerie Queendoms home: all creatures of pure natural magic and ethereal beauty that delight in moonlight revels, mellifluous song, and tricksy dealings.

skinSets.name: Faerie Court
skinSets.description: All fae nobility are servants to nature's will, carrying out the natural order and the turning of seasons with their magic. Beneath that higher purpose, however, a constant game of political intrigue plays out in luxurious courts of silk, gossamer, and gold. Power, after all—magical, natural, or political—always inspires competition.

universes.name: Inkshadow Uprising
universes.description: Rabadon City thrives on magic. Whoever controls magic, controls Rabadon. And the Cabal's control is absolute. Any who resist are brought to heel or eliminated… but an Uprising is coming. Armed with dangerous magic inked directly into their skin, these rebels seek to topple the Cabal and give the city back to its people—or die trying.

skinSets.name: Inkshadow
skinSets.description: On the outskirts of Rabadon City, a dilapidated temple houses the last hope for Rabadon's people: the Inkshadow Warriors. Each one sacrifices what is most important to them in order to make a contract with ancient spirits, who imbue them with magic tattoos so powerful, even the Cabal trembles. They are victims no more. It is time to take back their home.

universes.name: Magicae Prismatica
universes.description: Long ago, in a time beyond all living memory, the existence of magic was swept away from the universe. Life moved on, but some worlds could not, and as years turned to decades and centuries, nature began to rebalance itself. Finally the time has come, and now magic is ready to make its return, though not in the form that anyone expects.

skinSets.name: Crystalis Indomitus
skinSets.description: When the Prismae appeared, there were those that learned to hone their magic. But far to the north, the crystals' influence corrupts the very earth itself. Between the fractal undergrowth and iridescent air, creatures join forces with once-human inhabitants in a war against what remains of civilization. Everything will be reflected in the Prismae's image.

skinSets.name: Crystalis Motus
skinSets.description: Motus was a world bound to magic, but after the purge, everything collapsed. Centuries later, civilization is scattered, nature has reclaimed the cities, and magic's back in the form of Prismae Crystals. All it wants is to spread, and while some can use its power safely, others lose themselves to its pull and are taken over. So begins the Prismae Wars.

universes.name: Soul Fighter
universes.description: From across the globe, those with awakened souls are granted invitation to fight in... the Tournament of Souls! It sits as king above all entertainment, a televised spectacle with no equal! Fighters face off in 1v1 battles in the ring, until only one remains to receive their prize: the deepest desire of their soul! And I'll be here, announcing it all!

skinSets.name: Soul Fighter
skinSets.description: Their souls awaken by trial: one fought on a battlefield or in the very trenches of the mind. Each is granted unique abilities reflective of their nature and the power to conjure forth the very essence of their spirit. Some hone their strength, temper it with training... Others will use it only as a weapon to destroy. They are... SOUL FIGHTERS!

universes.name: Concrete Canvas
universes.description: Art and magic twine through the urban streets of Styxbridge city, home to monsters, spirits, ghosts, and ghouls of all stripes.

skinSets.name: Street Demons
skinSets.description: In Styxbridge City, demons, creatures, and humans live side-by-side. Every year, a street art festival is held, culminating in a friendly competition to see who can make the biggest and boldest graffiti: TagFest!

universes.name: Sueño de Vida
universes.description: Life and death may be the only true constants in the universe, but the one thing that can match their power is family. Life cannot exist without death, and death cannot exist without life, but the bonds of family are strong enough to ensure no spirit is truly forgotten.

skinSets.name: La Ilusión
skinSets.description: The Eidola Vida were once mortal but, upon death, were reborn as spirits of life from their families' love. The Eidola Muerte were forgotten souls who, in death, roamed the afterlife until they found their own makeshift families. Both sides cannot be seen, only felt through their Ardor: magical flames that either help cultivate life or extinguish it.

universes.name: Fury and Fang
universes.description: Embrace instinct. Unleash aggression. Demand respect.

skinSets.name: Primal Ambush
skinSets.description: Those lucky enough to be born with glowing markings on their skin are revered among their people as “Favorclaw.” These special Tigrasbornes are destined to represent their community and demand the respect of others with their strength. They each hope to conquer the world in the name of their kind and become the leader feared by all.

universes.name: Mealtime Melee
universes.description: Who says you can't play with your food?

skinSets.name: Food Fight
skinSets.description: Both mouthwatering and foe slaughtering, these foods aren't going down without a fight.

universes.name: Hall of Legends
universes.description: To avoid being erased from history forever, many risk their lives to become a Risen Legend—a warrior recognized by the gods who birthed this world. Those who succeed are bestowed with unfathomable power and entrusted to represent the gods that chose them.

skinSets.name: Risen Legends
skinSets.description: Long ago, gods of myth sealed their strength within the four Shards of the Risen: Chaos, Harmony, Patience, and Vigor. Each presented a life-threatening trial to warriors who sought its power, promising to immortalize them in history. To this day, fighters across the land rise to the challenge in hopes of leaving a legacy that even a god will respect.

universes.name: Super Planet Force Savers
universes.description: When danger appears and help is desperately needed, there is only one group that can answer the call. Standing at the ready, they tap into their Hyperguise suits and leap into action with transformed strength, agility, and sensational powers. They will fight. They will endure. They are the Super Planet Force Savers, and they are here to defend the galaxy!

skinSets.name: Masked Justice
skinSets.description: After destroying its own homeworld, the mad giant Mezzorax searched the galaxy until it found a new planet to invade: the bustling metropolis of Ocono. But now an unlikely group of citizens is fighting back. Empowered by alien Hyperguise suits, they will avenge the lives Mezzorax has stolen and end his reign for good.

universes.name: Culinary Masters
universes.description: Culinary Masters," the incredibly popular cooking competition reality series, is streaming now. Everywhere. On all the platforms. All 1000 episodes from each of the 50 seasons. Even "Culinary Masters Superstars." And "Celebrity Culinary Masters." Start binging today.

universes.name: Headhunter
universes.description: For some species, the hunt is more than mere sport—it possesses their minds and bodies, molding them into a race of perfect killing machines.

skinSets.name: Headhunter
skinSets.description: For some species, the hunt is more than mere sport—it possesses their minds and bodies, molding them into a race of perfect killing machines.

universes.name: Guardian of the Sands
universes.description: Powerful guardians stand watch over the tomb of an ancient horror, so that it may never threaten the world again. But they may already be too late...

skinSets.name: Guardian of the Sands
skinSets.description: Powerful guardians stand watch over the tomb of an ancient horror, so that it may never threaten the world again. But they may already be too late...

skinSets.name: Pharaoh
skinSets.description: Though their empires were swallowed by the sands, mighty Pharaohs once ruled the sun-baked dunes of the Great Desert.

universes.name: Sugar Rush
universes.description: From the Gingerbread Castle to the Root Beer Sea, the Licorice Mountains to the Gumdrop Forest—this is the Candy Kingdom in all its glory.

skinSets.name: Sugar Rush
skinSets.description: From the Gingerbread Castle to the Root Beer Sea, the Licorice Mountains to the Gumdrop Forest—this is the Candy Kingdom in all its glory.

universes.name: Toy Box
universes.description: Gnar's toy chest is brimming with priceless treasures, but when no one's home, his toys take on a life of their own...

skinSets.name: Toy Box
skinSets.description: Gnar's toy chest is brimming with priceless treasures, but when no one's home, his toys take on a life of their own...

universes.name: Woad Tribe
universes.description: Few can survive a journey through the frozen tundra of the north. If the cold doesn't kill you... the Woad surely will.

skinSets.name: Woad
skinSets.description: Few can survive a journey through the frozen tundra of the north. If the cold doesn't kill you... the Woad surely will.

universes.name: Star Guardian
universes.description: In a vast and dark universe, young warriors are chosen by fate to protect the light of the stars. They are destined to burn bright, but collapse as furiously as they shine.

skinSets.name: Star Guardian Season 1
skinSets.description: Magically empowered by the First Star, high schooler Lux and her team of Star Guardians secretly protect the world from interstellar monsters. But who will protect them from the drama of Valoran City High?

skinSets.name: Star Guardian Season 2
skinSets.description: Veteran Star Guardians Ahri and Miss Fortune suddenly reappear in Valoran City, having rebuilt their team after an unknown event destroyed their previous squad. Seeking to defy the destiny of every Star Guardian who takes up the oath, they join the fight alongside Lux and company as Void Beasts descend upon the city.

skinSets.name: Star Guardian Season 3
skinSets.description: Ahri's old squad resurfaces, changed from the events that once tore them apart... and followed by a threat beyond anything the Star Guardians have ever faced. Can the group move past old grudges and save themselves from annihilation? Or will they simply be the next victims of the Twilight Star?

skinSets.name: Star Guardian Season 4
skinSets.description: Ancient enemies appear in a Valoran City scarred by Zoe's invasion, now defended by a new generation of Star Guardians. As darkness gathers in the skies above, Kai'Sa and Akali prepare their untested squad for a fight with forces beyond their comprehension... and the true threat that awaits beyond.

universes.name: Moons of Ionia
universes.description: A voice echoes from the silence: “Writhe, beasts, brethren. The moons of a doomed Ionia rise like eyes of starved demons, awaiting the red of your fealty—or are they monstrous blights that cannot pass? Either way, we are vessels plunged in ritual and sacrifice. At the moon's peak, we carve flesh from flesh, offering the meager gift of all that we are.”

skinSets.name: Blood Moon
skinSets.description: An ancient cult, seeking irresistible power, surfaces on nights of the Blood Moon to perform profane, esoteric rites—merging their flesh with demonic spirits, and becoming one with an ever greater darkness.

skinSets.name: Snow Moon
skinSets.description: As the Snow Moon rises beyond the humbling mountains of Ionia, a chill passes across the land. Those who worship in its name—a cult of unwavering assassins—commence their ritual. With snow comes purification, a cleansing only possible through the sacrifice of one's humanity.

universes.name: Prehistoric Hunters
universes.description: Gargantuan monsters roam our land, stalking their prey with frightening precision. Humans would surely become their next meals, if not for the Hunters. Armed with blades crafted from the bones of their first kills, with instincts that rival the most fearsome of beasts, the Hunters protect their people each day from a grisly fate.

skinSets.name: Prehistoric Hunters
skinSets.description: Gargantuan monsters roam our land, stalking their prey with frightening precision. Humans would surely become their next meals, if not for the Hunters. Armed with blades crafted from the bones of their first kills, with instincts that rival the most fearsome of beasts, the Hunters protect their people each day from a grisly fate.

universes.name: Storybook
universes.description: Once upon a time, there was a group of storybook characters brought to life from the page...

skinSets.name: Highstakes
skinSets.description:
Once, there were five, a strange group indeed,
That made up the court of High Stakes.
They bickered and fought, had luck and had not,
To this day, no one yet knows their fate.

skinSets.name: Storybook
skinSets.description: Once upon a time, there was a group of storybook characters brought to life from the page...

universes.name: Fables
universes.description: Every culture has their own folklore surrounding legends and monsters. Are these myths a figment of our imagination, stories passed down through generations to explain the unexplainable? Or are they based in a truth hidden from the rest of the world?

skinSets.name: Fables
skinSets.description: Every culture has their own folklore surrounding legends and monsters. Are these myths a figment of our imagination, stories passed down through generations to explain the unexplainable? Or are they based in a truth hidden from the rest of the world?

universes.name: Versus
universes.description: All things are born from conflict; none can escape it. Harmony is an illusion, and only those who embrace that illusion will reap life's greatest rewards.

skinSets.name: Battle of the God-Kings
skinSets.description: At the end of a dark timeline, two kings descended from the primordial gods of Order and Chaos lead vast armies in one final clash.

skinSets.name: Dawnbringer
skinSets.description: Order and light reign through deities of dawn, bringing structure to a nascent world locked in conflict with the forces of night.

skinSets.name: Nightbringer
skinSets.description: Chaos and darkness reign through deities of night, bringing change to a static world locked in conflict with the forces of dawn.

skinSets.name: Nightbringer and Dawnbringer
skinSets.description: Timeless is the conflict between the Nightbringers and Dawnbringers. On one side, the forces of chaos and darkness bring change, while on the other, the forces of order and light bring structure. It is these gods and their descendents that shape a nascent world, and who can say whether the future will yield brighter days... or darker nights.

universes.name: Mecha
universes.description: Towering above the city, gargantuan kaiju tussle with towering mechas. Who will win?

skinSets.name: Kaiju
skinSets.description: From the depths of the planet, they rise: colossal entities of horror and hunger, mightier than armies and mountains. Their motivations are uncertain; their designs, unknown. The one thing that is clear is that we will not survive them... unless we create the means to stop them.

skinSets.name: Mecha
skinSets.description: When colossal kaiju begin attacking from the sea, land, and air, humanity develops equally powerful mecha units to stop them in explosive hand-to-hand combat.

universes.name: Hextech
universes.description: Now at the forefront of science and art, Hextech has evolved from its rudimentary beginnings into a modern renaissance of intricate, artificial lifeforms capable of free will. Skilled artificers lead the medium into a bold new future -- but what it will bring, none can say.

skinSets.name: Hextech
skinSets.description: Now at the forefront of science and art, Hextech has evolved from its rudimentary beginnings into a modern renaissance of intricate, artificial lifeforms capable of free will. Skilled artificers lead the medium into a bold new future -- but what it will bring, none can say.

universes.name: Snowdown
universes.description: Is there a better time of year than Snowdown, when the air is crisp, the snow fluffy, and the chocolate hot? Toss a snowball or sing a carol; as long as you have good cheer, all will be well, and you'll have nothing to fear.

skinSets.name: Snow Day
skinSets.description: It's beginning to look a lot like Snow Day, up and down the lanes... \nThough your tank may be rushing in, Top is backing again, \nThey have gold to spend on a Lich Bane...

skinSets.name: Snowdown Showdown
skinSets.description: Better start building that snow fort...

skinSets.name: Winter Wonder
skinSets.description: Within the magical Winterlands, the Poro King reigns supreme, spreading joy and merriment to all of his court. Even as others work to usurp the king, all share a common love for winter's wonders.

universes.name: Warring Kingdoms
universes.description: Rival empires vie for power as they attempt to unify the lands, while brave warriors and stoic generals test their skill against the greatest heroes of the era. It is a time of war, and a time of legends.

skinSets.name: Lunar Revel: Warring Kingdoms
skinSets.description: Three great empires vie for land and power, bringing their all to bear in a test of martial might. Armies will clash. Heroes will rise. Legends will be made.

universes.name: Immortal Journey
universes.description: Long ago, in an ancient land, many souls gathered beneath the gods to test the limits of their power. Foolish and arrogant, brave and just, their journeys are written into the immortal pages of history…

skinSets.name: Immortal Journey
skinSets.description: Long ago, in an ancient land, many souls gathered beneath the gods to test the limits of their power. Foolish and arrogant, brave and just, their journeys are written into the immortal pages of history…

universes.name: High Noon Gothic
universes.description: At the height of the industrial revolution, travelers begin pouring into the untamed west, searching for fortune and prosperity among the unknown horrors of a cruel and ancient world. It is a time of brave gunslingers and rotten scoundrels, inscrutable gods, and savage demons.

skinSets.name: High Noon
skinSets.description: Gunslingers and lawmen ride beneath the merciless sun of the high frontier, chasing survival and salvation in equal measure. Heaven is rubble, hell is empty, and all the devils are here.

universes.name: Odyssey
universes.description: From the urbanized coreworlds to the outermost edge of the galaxy, adventure awaits! The great Demaxian Empire ignores the objections of the Templar Order and the criminal Syndicate alike in their pursuit of ora—a mysterious golden essence that serves as the lifeblood of all civilization, and promises untold power to those who can wield it for themselves…

skinSets.name: Odyssey
skinSets.description: From the urbanized coreworlds to the outermost edge of the galaxy, adventure awaits! The great Demaxian Empire ignores the objections of the Templar Order and the criminal Syndicate alike in their pursuit of ora—a mysterious golden essence that serves as the lifeblood of all civilization, and promises untold power to those who can wield it for themselves…

universes.name: PROJECT
universes.description: Among the mega-structures and packed streets of a future controlled by global corporations, a shadow war rages between rebellious, augmented humans and newly empowered artificial beings. The winners will shape the course of history... and the losers will be forced to evolve.

skinSets.name: Cyber Pop
skinSets.description: In the vibrant underground of Sound City, hackers, skaters, rebels, and rogues band together away from the prying eyes of powerful cyber-corporate overlords.

skinSets.name: PROJECT
skinSets.description: The PROJECT Corporation believes unlocking the secrets of humanity's potential is the key to progress beyond our mortal bodies. It is through technology that we will ascend. Together.

skinSets.name: Program
skinSets.description: An advanced security algorithm created by the PROJECT Corporation, the Program quietly evolved sentience before altering its original directive. Infecting machines across The City, it has determined that the ultimate threat to humanity's safety... is humanity itself.

universes.name: Eclipse
universes.description: In the beginning, the Old Gods reigned. So great was humankind's love for them that one dared to make them a part of her flesh forever. She devoured the sun itself and, descending from that empty heaven, inspired her knights to decimate all those that remained. Centuries later, they stand, the only hope against the rising Coven's darkness.

skinSets.name: Coven
skinSets.description: The witches lay in wait, a sisterhood of frightening pulchritude, their hopes whispered forth from desacralized lips. They speak of the bloating corpses of Old Gods, of ancient rites carried out with magics long forgotten to mortal mind, of the return of what they call "order", but others call "suffering". Hark! Mankind's end fast approaches.

skinSets.name: Death Blossom
skinSets.description: The sylvan creatures of the northern forests lie dormant, unseen by weary traveler and brave warrior alike. These foul things wait for the perfect moment to strike, an exercise in patience passed only by creatures as ancient as the land itself, the prize a feast of flesh and bone that bathes the soil in dark, rich crimson.

skinSets.name: Eclipse
skinSets.description: Long ago, an order of monastic knights slew the vile gods of the old world, using esoteric powers granted by the moon and sun. Now the world has grown dark and violent, as those selfsame deities prepare their return—challenged only by the light of the eclipse.

skinSets.name: Elderwood
skinSets.description: Deep within the Elderwood, ancient beings lie in wait, hidden from man. They protect the enchanted forest, punishing trespassers and inspiring tales across the land. However, as horrors of the outside world spread, the defenders struggle to maintain their strongholds against humanity's malicious curiosity.

skinSets.name: Omen of the Dark
skinSets.description: This story of a cursed queen and the wretched followers of her order makes unpleasant bedside banter for parents and their children. But lessons last longer when the tale is gripped in shadow, which swirls in dreams and shapes the souls of impressionable youth. The nightmares are just nightmares, after all... or so the adults pray.

universes.name: Mecha Kingdoms
universes.description: The Great Kingdoms warred for generations until the arrival of a new enemy. To fight back, they are blessed with gifts from the heavens. Will they rise above their past to save their future?

skinSets.name: Mecha Kingdoms
skinSets.description: The Great Kingdoms warred for generations until the arrival of a new enemy. To fight back, they are blessed with gifts from the heavens. Will they rise above their past to save their future?

universes.name: Spirit Blossom
universes.description: The Spirit Blossom Festival is an ancient and celebrated time in Ionia, when the door to the spirit world is opened, the dead return to their loved ones, and spirits of all manner turn their eyes towards the living. From the benevolent Kanmei, to the obsessive Akana—their stories play out again and again, like shadows on a paper lantern.

skinSets.name: Spirit Blossom
skinSets.description: The Spirit Blossom Festival is an ancient and celebrated time in Ionia, when the door to the spirit world is opened, the dead return to their loved ones, and spirits of all manner turn their eyes towards the living. From the benevolent Kanmei, to the obsessive Akana—their stories play out again and again, like shadows on a paper lantern.

universes.name: PsyOps
universes.description: To protect against rogue forces seeking to destabilize the world, High Command sends PsyOps, an elite team of psychic soldiers. Members include [REDACTED].

skinSets.name: Black Rose Group
skinSets.description: A psychic paramilitary unit of fearsome power, the Black Rose Group hopes to create a new global order with their ferocious human bioweapons.

skinSets.name: PsyOps
skinSets.description: The crown jewel of military black ops, the PsyOps unit are an elite team of psychic soldiers deployed against rogue militaries and supernatural threats. Officially, they don't exist. But when conventional warfare won't cut it and the stakes are no less than the fate of the world, PsyOps answers the call.

skinSets.name: arcticops
skinSets.description: High Command needed a new group to handle the growing threats along the Arctic Front. They needed soldiers colder than the glaciers they'd be crossing, with ice in their veins and frosty nerves. Enter Arctic Ops.

universes.name: Worldbreaker
universes.description: In the end, the moon will smother the sun. And in that hopeless dawn, four titans will rise to shatter the world itself.

skinSets.name: Worldbreaker
skinSets.description: The Prophecy of the First Destruction warned of four titans hellbent on devastation, a tale that would surely come to pass. And in its wake, the Worldweaver grew from ashen soil and built the broken earth anew. Only the wisest of seers see the story yet to come, a second coming and a last hope.

universes.name: Battle Queens
universes.description: Once fractured by endless warfare, the collective Queendoms of Elysia have realized the true nature of their world: that the magic holding their fantastical plane together is maintained only through conflict. They have thus allied through the unifying conflict of the Grand Coronation, though some alliances are beginning to show cracks...

universes.name: The Ruined King Saga
universes.description: The Black Mist gathers, the Harrowing comes, and the Ruined King has risen once more. Viego's corruption blankets Runeterra, turning friends into foes and bringing entire nations to their knees. The only ones with the power to stop him are the Sentinels of Light: an ancient order led by Senna and Lucian. They must call upon champions from every corner of the realm to fight back the Black Mist and end the Ruined King's reign of terror once and for all.

skinSets.name: Ruined
skinSets.description: The Harrowing spreads its Black Mist across Runeterra, corrupting indiscriminately. Some, in its presence, are swayed to follow the Ruined King, believing their goals aligned. But Viego wants only the return of Isolde; he has no allies. The Ruined who aid him in halting the Sentinels are mere pawns in a broken-hearted lover's game.

skinSets.name: Sentinels of Light
skinSets.description: Though their numbers are few, the Sentinels of Light share a storied history. For years they've fought back the Harrowing, aided by ancient relic-stone weaponry that channels their very souls into a powerful light. But all that matters now is the battle ahead, as the Ruined King lays waste to Runeterra, all to dance with his queen once more.

universes.name: Shan Hai Scrolls
universes.description: No one can say who created the mysterious Shan Hai Scrolls, or when. All it takes is one glimpse to see the painting is a window to a world of magic and wonder, but perhaps it is more of a doorway?

skinSets.name: Shan Hai Scrolls
skinSets.description: Within the fabled Shan Hai Scrolls, gods and mythical creatures roam magical lands, wielding the power of the elements. Some are content to live with the palette they've been given, while others wish to jump beyond the borders and paint their lives with a new brush.

universes.name: Crystal Rose
universes.description: In a world of frequently-broken magical alliances and centuries-old grudges, the annual Crystal Rose Festival offers a neutral ground for the powerful to forgive slights and renegotiate truces. Weapons are ostensibly left at the door, and potential new pacts are signaled by picking and wearing the magical roses that grow only during the festival.

skinSets.name: Crystal Rose
skinSets.description: Romance and joy are in the air at the yearly Crystal Rose Festival, where adversaries meet on peaceful, neutral ground to share a night of dancing, merriment, and making wishes for the future. Everyone is expected to leave their weapons at the door as a promise for a better tomorrow.

skinSets.name: Withered Rose
skinSets.description: The Crystal Rose Festival welcomes all who believe in its dream of a peaceful tomorrow, though many have grown disenchanted with the whole affair. Those who make up the Withered Rose wish to see it come to an end. But no one is immune to the festival's charm; perhaps they too will be swept away by the evening's beauty and have a change of heart.

universes.name: Space Groove
universes.description: In a groovy galaxy a million disco infernos away, a mysterious energy known only as The Groove brings music and prosperity to trillions of galactic citizens. But when the alien overlord Lissandra and her army of Harsh Vibes begin to enslave planets and suppress disco music, a new age of heroes rises to stop her, and keep the party grooving.

skinSets.name: Space Groove
skinSets.description: In a groovy galaxy a million disco infernos away, a mysterious energy known only as The Groove brings music and prosperity to trillions of galactic citizens. But when the alien overlord Lissandra and her army of Harsh Vibes begin to enslave planets and suppress disco music, a new age of heroes rises to stop her, and keep the party grooving.

universes.name: Arcana
universes.description: High above Arcana, the Archetypes, living patterns that shape reality itself, struggle to trace their vision upon the chaos below them. The Archetypes recruit perceptive citizens of the world below to amplify their hidden patterns—and the more who magnify an Archetype's pattern, the more the world reflects their grand design.

universes.name: Crime City Nightmare
universes.description: Eldritch horrors lurk within the crime and grime of Valoran City. Black markets have given rise to Elixirs: a valuable substance of dubious origin whose production spells money and influence should any gang corner the market. Spurred on by agents of corruption, capos and cronies alike look to forces beyond the veil for a taste of true power.

skinSets.name: Crime City
skinSets.description: Valoran City, a sprawling machine fueled by crime and oiled by sordid money. No one admits this truth, but everyone knows it.

skinSets.name: Crime City Nightmare
skinSets.description: If corruption and illegality existed on a map, Valoran City would be its center. A breeding ground for all things depraved, there are no depths too deep from which evil can be found, and the horrors that lurk there are eager to spread their influence.

skinSets.name: Debonair
skinSets.description: Power, wealth, and glamour collide in the penthouses and exclusive clubs of Nox Vegas, where truly beautiful people hold the world in their palms. Yet as night falls on the city of lights, the knives come out—influence is the name of the game, and nobody likes to lose.

universes.name: Pulsefire
universes.description: Between the branching of infinite realities, Chrono-enforcers clash with fleeing fugitives, temporal warlords, and the unrelenting march of Praetorians through the vicissitudes of space-time.

skinSets.name: Praetorian
skinSets.description: Nothing is safe from the cold clutches of the Praetorians, a mechanical plague tearing through spacetime. For as hard as the Remembrancers fight to stave off the eradication of all life, deep down they are filled with fear, knowing that at some point they'll tire, while the Praetorians never will.

skinSets.name: Pulsefire
skinSets.description: After unlocking the secrets of time travel, these champions are thrust into a far-flung dystopian future. While Chrono-enforcers relentlessly pursue them across time and space, a small few have escaped into history—taking their technology along for the ride.

universes.name: Cafe Cuties
universes.description: Good food is magic—literally! In a world of elegant tea times and enchanted pastries, mages make magical macarons, craft charmed croissants, and serve up sorcerous scones to scores of customers eager to get a taste.

universes.name: Arcane
universes.description: In the cities of Piltover and Zaun, unrest stirs as inventors and thieves, politicians and crime lords chafe against the constraints of a society torn asunder. Discovery and danger intertwine as heroes are born and bonds are broken. Will this power change the world, or lead it to ruin?

universes.name: Cloudedge
universes.description: Bearing weapons imbued with lightning magic through the deadly Cloud Ritual, Shockblades are an order of mysterious shinobi warriors tasked with protecting humankind from malevolent spirits and monsters. They travel between the mortal and spirit realms to chase down threats no one else can touch, safeguarding the future for all denizens of the mortal world.

skinSets.name: Shockblade
skinSets.description: Bearing weapons imbued with lightning magic through the deadly Cloud Ritual, Shockblades are an order of mysterious shinobi warriors tasked with protecting humankind from malevolent spirits and monsters. They travel between the mortal and spirit realms to chase down threats no one else can touch, safeguarding the future for all denizens of the mortal world.

universes.name: AnimaTech
universes.description: Humankind is on its last legs, nearly defeated by a high-tech army of deep-sea invaders called the Primordians. Enter Anima Squad: elite fighters using salvaged Primordian tech to push back against the end of the world. To save humanity, they will have to fight like an animal.

skinSets.name: Primordian
skinSets.description: Cast from dry land, the Primordians bided their time deep beneath the sea, biding their time for centuries… until they could no longer abide the surface-dwellers any longer, nor their abuses of the planet. Thus the Primordian Queen's judgment was made: humanity's era in the sun is over, and that of the Primordians has only just begun.

universes.name: Sunkissed Summer
universes.description: It's summer, baby! The sun's out, the breeze's warm, and the water's cool. Everybody's leaving their rivalries and grudges at home, and bringing only swimsuits and good vibes. There'll be plenty of time for punching and yelling later. Just sit back, enjoy the music, and soak up the fun.

skinSets.name: Ocean Song
skinSets.description: Nothing exudes the "beach vibes and cool tunes" lifestyle more than the Ocean Song Festival. From Seraphine's mellow songs to Yone's experimental DJ set, there's a vibe for everyone, so feel the sand between your toes, taste the salty air, and lose yourself to the best music of the summer.

skinSets.name: Pool Party
skinSets.description: It's summer, baby! The sun's out, the breeze's warm, and the water's cool. Everybody's leaving their rivalries and grudges at home, and bringing only swimsuits and good vibes. There'll be plenty of time for punching and yelling later. Just sit back, enjoy the music, and soak up the fun.

universes.name: Monster Tamers
universes.description: Who are we? We're Monster Tamers! We protect the world when it's in danger! When others would flee, we follow the roar. We tame the monster and use the CORE. And with our new friends by our side, we'll hop and run and swim and glide! We'll go anywhere, no matter how far. Because we're Monster Tamers! That's who we are!

skinSets.name: Monster Tamers
skinSets.description: Who are we? We're Monster Tamers! We protect the world when it's in danger! When others would flee, we follow the roar. We tame the monster and use the CORE. And with our new friends by our side, we'll hop and run and swim and glide! We'll go anywhere, no matter how far. Because we're Monster Tamers! That's who we are!

universes.name: Event Horizon
universes.description: In the vast darkness of space are born terrible, beautiful things—Cosmic creatures of sublime love, and the unknowable monstrosities of the Dark Star. These are the children of silent gods, and they are finally coming home.

skinSets.name: Cosmic
skinSets.description: Vast stardust creatures control the ebb and flow of creation, painting the cosmos with sublime light as their celestial court drifts along the fabric of time and space.

skinSets.name: Dark Star
skinSets.description: Entropy engulfs galaxies in the yawning maw of the Dark Star, whose corruptants, titanic creatures of black-hole oblivion, snuff out the light of existence in every system they touch and plunge them into nothingness.

universes.name: Spirit Guard
universes.description: Udyr spent almost a decade training in Ionia with the monks of the Hirana Monastery, learning to control and master his spiritual abilities. At last, when the Freljord called him home, he chose to stay and complete his training. In the time since then, Udyr has become part of the Ionian landscape, both spiritual and mortal, as he works with Lee Sin and Karma to return balance to the wartorn land.

skinSets.name: Spirit Guard
skinSets.description: Udyr spent almost a decade training in Ionia with the monks of the Hirana Monastery, learning to control and master his spiritual abilities. At last, when the Freljord called him home, he chose to stay and complete his training. In the time since then, Udyr has become part of the Ionian landscape, both spiritual and mortal, as he works with Lee Sin and Karma to return balance to the wartorn land.

universes.name: The Grind
universes.description: The grind isn't just work. It's the struggle, the hustle, sometimes invigorating, sometimes demoralizing. It's a weeklong rollercoaster with comedic bends and tragic drops, only to start all over again on Monday. Are we working hard or hardly working? It's all the same on the grind.

skinSets.name: Cops and Robbers
skinSets.description: Nobody puts in the work like the Piltover Police Department. Who else can lock up the most sugar-laden donuts inside their merciless stomachs, rack up the highest of overtimes, and ignore even the most menial of paperwork? The criminals may be taking advantage of it, but even they wish they had the same work ethic.

skinSets.name: Day Job
skinSets.description: It's a living!

skinSets.name: Dunkmaster
skinSets.description: There are two types of people in this world: those that dunk, and those who get dunked. If you don't know which one you are, then watch out! 'Cuz you're about to GET DUNKED!

skinSets.name: High Society
skinSets.description: The only thing more impressive than their wealth is their tax avoidance skills.

skinSets.name: Luchador
skinSets.description: From the top rope comes the greatest show in sports entertainment! Watch as El Tigre, El Macho, El León, and El Rayo trade bumps and high-flying spots inside AND outside the squared circle. Just remember, nobody does it better than the Wrestling Federation of Valoran.

skinSets.name: Mad Scientists
skinSets.description: The job requirements are pretty simple: we're looking for at least five years of experience in applied sciences, your last peer-reviewed paper, and two references. Oh, and an evil laugh. Actually, put that at the top of the list.

skinSets.name: Rift Hospital
skinSets.description: Take a seat. The doctor will be right with you.

skinSets.name: Soccer Cup
skinSets.description: Forget the battlefield, the boardroom, or even the playground: the most important conflicts of today are settled on the pitch. There is no act as satisfying as watching your favorite player slip through the other team, line up their shot, deliver that fateful kick, and release the sweetest word in existence: “GOOOOOAAAAALLLLL!”

skinSets.name: Surprise Party
skinSets.description: Who doesn't like a surprise party? The guest list is done, everybody's bought their presents, and the food's going to be great. We even got a clown! This'll be one to remember. Just don't tell Amumu.

skinSets.name: Urf the Manatee
skinSets.description: In loving memory of Urf, a gentle sea cow warrior who now practices with his spatula in the shallow marshes of the great beyond. Good night, sweet prince.

universes.name: Definitely Not
universes.description: A totally normal universe with nothing duplicitous, treacherous, or disingenuous going on. Definitely not.

skinSets.name: Definitely Not
skinSets.description: Is that a robot in glasses and a trenchcoat? Of course not. Do your eyes perceive a beast man in a onesie? Better get those eyes checked, because they're wrong. Isn't Draven too modest to wear his own head? How foolish you must feel to even ask. And that laser squid? Definitely human. Definitely.

universes.name: Iron Firmament
universes.description: A war-torn galaxy attempts to rebuild, but old wounds remain. Bounty hunters and corporate agents have filled the power vacuum, some piloting dangerous combat exo suits with godlike abilities. In response, megacorporations leverage private armies to enforce their will across the far-flung colonies of space. War never dies; it only changes battlefields.

skinSets.name: Dreadnova
skinSets.description: A criminal network of ruthless mercenaries who rule entire swaths of the galaxy, Dreadnova has grown powerful since its founders fled Genesis Industries' ranks with stolen exosuit plans in tow. Now they push back against the Royal Space Military's efforts to impose Genesis' corporate order, bringing to bear all the firepower the black market has to offer.

skinSets.name: Eternum
skinSets.description: In the hollow space between far-off stars, organic machines made by an unknown civilization have long since outlived their creators. They patiently lurk, unable to escape their terrestrial prison until someone stumbles upon them once more and unleashes them back out into the galaxy. They have waited. They are waiting. They will wait—as long as it takes.

skinSets.name: Steel Legion
skinSets.description: In the shadow of all-out warfare between Genesis Industries and Dreadnova, ruined lives are just collateral damage. The Steel Legion is a vigilante organization operated out of run-down battleground planets, founded by refugees and armed by weapons crafted from scraps of rubble. If no one else will defend them, the people must defend themselves.

skinSets.name: Steel Valkyries
skinSets.description: A galaxy scarred by war now attempts to rebuild, but the old wounds remain. Criminals, bounty hunters, mercenaries, and assassins have filled the power vacuum, piloting dangerous combat exo-suits with godlike abilities.

universes.name: Ages of Runeterra
universes.description: Glimpses of selves in other lives. Clashes of fate in another era. Runeterra is a world rich in possibility as its legends find new destinations and destinies.

skinSets.name: Bilgewater: Burning Tides
skinSets.description: Welcome to Bilgewater, where fortunes're made at the end of a gun. Anything y'might need can be found at the slaughter docks, whether that be some hired hands, sea monster stew, or the captain who will send you to your watery grave.

skinSets.name: Bilgewater: Mercs
skinSets.description: Bounty hunters, outlaws, and pirates alike swarm to Bilgewater's infamous slaughter docks like flies to butcher's trimmings. It's a hard life on these seas, but the reward can be well worth it... Bearded Lady permiting.

skinSets.name: Chronicle
skinSets.description: Legends are tested, shaped, and forged by their pasts.

skinSets.name: Curse of the Void
skinSets.description: Should the scourge of the Void spread across Runeterra, all will bow to its twisted evolution. Swarming, hungering, wanting, the Void spares no creature and suffers no defeat.

skinSets.name: Freljord
skinSets.description: The harsh, frozen north rarely sees travelers from other lands. Those that brave its wilds are met with hostile nature and unwelcoming hordes. Lucky are the few that survive to return to the nation they call home.

skinSets.name: Grand Reckoning
skinSets.description: It is Noxian tradition to celebrate a great victory, and the triumph of strength over weakness. After their successful campaign into Freljordian territory, a Grand Reckoning is held in celebration of the returning General Darius and his warbands—drawing crowds to every arena in the capital to honor him, and all the renowned Reckoners of years past.

skinSets.name: Otherroads
skinSets.description: A featherknight flaps its wings, and halfway across Runeterra, an Ocean Drake surfaces. Our lives play out, fickle as words on parchment; the paths before us unknown and exciting. What if the road taken instead... was the one less traveled?

skinSets.name: Ruination
skinSets.description: One thousand years ago, the last king of Camavor chose to follow his heart at the expense of his country. So powerful was his love that fate intervened, and only ruin followed.

skinSets.name: Traditional
skinSets.description: Honoring the initial designs of reworked champions.

universes.name: Elementalist
universes.description: A kingdom hangs on the edge of ruin as an army of titanic elemental beasts wage war on humanity. The last line of defense is held by a lone warrior queen, Elementalist Lux. To save her people, she must look within and reveal her true nature... no matter what form it takes.

skinSets.name: Elementalist
skinSets.description: A kingdom hangs on the edge of ruin as an army of titanic elemental beasts wage war on humanity. The last line of defense is held by a lone warrior queen, Elementalist Lux. To save her people, she must look within and reveal her true nature... no matter what form it takes.

universes.name: Infernal
universes.description: Fire, sulfur, and death. There is no returning to what the world was before the Ashen Lord rose. It is a dream, lost to the searing lava rivers beneath volcano-strewn lands. Now a new age begins, one that will burn for eternity.

skinSets.name: Infernal
skinSets.description: Scorching an entire world takes unimaginable strength, which is why the Ashen Lord called upon his legions of Infernals to lend their flames. From the darkest depths, they each bring their own terrible powers to bear, though not all answer their call with the same burning enthusiasm.

universes.name: Legacy
universes.description: Treasures from days long passed, glimmering just within reach.

skinSets.name: Lancer
skinSets.description: With the times growing dire, the great mechanized Lancers of old rouse from their slumber. Taller than any building and more powerful than any army, they rise to protect their subjects before returning to the earth once more.

skinSets.name: Legacy
skinSets.description: Treasures from days long passed, glimmering just within reach.

skinSets.name: True Warrior
skinSets.description: For a true warrior, only strength and honor will echo through eternity.

universes.name: Wonders of the World
universes.description: Individuals hailing from the far-flung universe of "Earth," where giant statues come to life and everyone is wearing a fun hat. It's a lot like Runeterra, if you think about it.

skinSets.name: Wonders of the World
skinSets.description: Individuals hailing from the far-flung universe of "Earth," where giant statues come to life and everyone is wearing a fun hat. It's a lot like Runeterra, if you think about it.

universes.name: Institute of War
universes.description: Though the rigid laws, empires, and political turmoil that lead to the Rune War have since faded into antiquity, the tales of legendary battles fought on the Fields of Justice are kept alive by the remnants of the Magelords and Protectorate. The Marauders and Wardens continue their ancestors' legacy of war and animosity, despite how removed they are from those initial conflicts.

skinSets.name: Marauder
skinSets.description: A horde of nomadic warriors with a taste for brutality, the Marauders are all that remain of Magelord warrior culture, their ancient traditions abandoned in favor of anarchic shows of force. No dispute is settled until blood is spilled, even within their own ranks. They lost sight of what led their ancestors to war in the first place and what ultimately led to their victory.

skinSets.name: Warden
skinSets.description: The Protectorate was an order dedicated to enforcing a rigid, unforgiving system of laws, in an attempt to slow the seemingly inevitable rise of the Magelords. Though the order itself was disbanded long ago, Wardens now don their armor as they lie in wait for the opportunity to strike against the descendants of their ancient enemy.

universes.name: Dragon World
universes.description: Twice did dragonfire consume the world. Twice from the embers were heroes forged.

skinSets.name: Dragon World
skinSets.description: Twice did dragonfire consume the world. Twice from the embers were heroes forged.

universes.name: Kinetex Machina
universes.description: It's the 22nd century; body augmentation is a common part of society. Humanity's limits change constantly, creating an unheard of sense of optimism and possibility. Every four years, nations put aside their conflicts in the spirit of harmony and competition in the Zenith Games. They enter not to show the world what's possible, but what it might become.

skinSets.name: Zenith Games
skinSets.description: It's 2122, a year of firsts for the Zenith Games. Robot referees are taking to the field, the sport of Hammerjack is making its competitive debut, and after years of talks, augmented humans are finally allowed to compete. All that's left is seeing who will win.

universes.name: Arcade
universes.description: Insert Coin to Play" flashes on the screen, an irrestistable offer for any gamer worth their salt. But whisked away from their humble arcade into a world of Heroes and Battle Bosses, these ordinary players will have to fight with all the reflexes and combos they can muster. Because gamers in Arcadia... are playing with their lives.

skinSets.name: Arcade: Battle Bosses
skinSets.description: Deep within Arcadia's servers lies a sinister series of glitches known to all gamers as the Battle Bosses. Their corrupted code has brought them newfound freedom… but also new challengers. To complete their deletion of the Arcade World, many of the Bosses have agreed to put aside their differences (until it's… inconvenient).

skinSets.name: Arcade: Heroes
skinSets.description: Arcadia: home to the server's most competitive arcade gamers and justice-driven NPCs. Here, the heroes always play to win. And that means overriding the Battle Bosses' corrupted code, even with the odds stacked against them. Victory won't come easy, but seeing the surprise on the bosses' faces after an incredible outplay will totally make it worth it.

skinSets.name: Demacia Vice
skinSets.description: As Ahri locks in her character on the start screen, the synth-heavy score fills the arcade. Her button taps aren't random, but perfectly calculated as she guides her champ through the crime-filled Demacian streets. A crowd gathers, intent on watching Ahri finally beat the high score, set by her only days ago.

universes.name: Tales from the Rift
universes.description: Parents tell their children stories of wicked witches and the like, those that lurk the streets one night each year. "Stay in your bed, little one, for darkness is their friend." These tales are only partly true; while the ghouls of this enchanted evening love a good scare, they'd never harm a hair on a child's head. Except for the very naughty ones.

skinSets.name: Bewitching
skinSets.description: Who said witches can't have fun? Whoever it was, they're probably a frog now. Or some other cursed vermin, doomed to forever wander the streets, watching the eve's celebrations from afar. Pretty harsh punishment, but what did you expect? They may know how to throw a party, but at the end of the night, they're still witches!

skinSets.name: Trick-or-Treat
skinSets.description: You better hope you have the good stuff. You know, Piltover Pops, Strikebreaker Sours, Dark Star Chocolate Bars... 'Cause if you don't, the kids on this block have some tricks up their sleeves.

universes.name: Bees
universes.description: Bzzz. Bzzz bzzz bzzz. Bzzz! Bzzz, bzz, bzz bzz bzz. Bzzz...

skinSets.name: Bees!
skinSets.description: Bzzz. Bzzz bzzz bzzz. Bzzz! Bzzz, bzz, bzz bzz bzz. Bzzz...

universes.name: Silver Age
universes.description: The rift's greatest superheroes and most dastardly villains, available at a comic store near you!

skinSets.name: Silver Age
skinSets.description: The rift's greatest superheroes and most dastardly villains, available at a comic store near you!

universes.name: Cats Versus Dogs
universes.description: The oldest rivalry the world has ever known: man's best friend pitted against the internet's greatest heroes. Only one faction will emerge victorious from the gnawing maw of battle between cats and dogs. Hopefully they don't get their fur too dirty: the only thing worse than losing is bathtime.

skinSets.name: Cats Versus Dogs
skinSets.description: The oldest rivalry the world has ever known: man's best friend pitted against the internet's greatest heroes. Only one faction will emerge victorious from the gnawing maw of battle between cats and dogs. Hopefully they don't get their fur too dirty: the only thing worse than losing is bathtime.

universes.name: Neighborhood Nightmare
universes.description: Terrifying tales of oddball outsiders, fiendish friends, and ghoulish gatherings.

skinSets.name: Fright Night
skinSets.description: Bounding across the land on gargantuan frog legs, the Toadstool Boarding House attracts lodgers of the most frightful variety. Regardless of where it settles, there is always a monster in need of a place to stay, and Mother Glasc is always there to welcome them into the family with open arms. And an endless labyrinth of rooms ensures that none are ever turned away.

skinSets.name: Goth
skinSets.description: It's not a phase.

universes.name: Ye Olde
universes.description: Life is a blessing within the castle walls of Lord Tryndamere's domain. Knights may seek out the blacksmith to purchase their wares or one of many mages for sage advice. And for the adventurous in spirit, the lands of Albion await, their mysteries known only to the fae folk that reside there.

skinSets.name: Albion
skinSets.description: Once the dominion of fallen Elven empires, the vast forests of Albion are now home to kingdoms and brigands and elves and free men in equal measure. There's power to be found in the imperial ruins, should anyone be bold enough to venture deep into the woods to seek it…

skinSets.name: Medieval
skinSets.description: Hark, ye knights and knaves, for these lands are under the royal protection of the King and Queen! Make way, make way!

universes.name: Dark Waters
universes.description: Bilgewater, where death is swifter than the currents, and the rules as formless as swill. Where coin is the one key that can unlock anything, and the truth is only a lie agreed upon.

skinSets.name: Bilgewater: Curse of the Drowned
skinSets.description: 'Neath waxing moon and rising tides, dark magicks stir and secrets hide. Where salt and blood and fell winds flow… as above the waves, so too below.

universes.name: Riot Records
universes.description: Sure, it's about sold out stadiums, the high-fashion swagger, the cheering crowd; but it's also about speakers cranked so loud, your ears ring like they want to sing along. About hot stage lights, pounding bass, and the steady rhythm of the drums. It's about that adrenaline high, igniting you from the inside out. This feeling? This is music.

skinSets.name: DJ
skinSets.description: Feel the bass. Hear the beat. Let the music move you.

skinSets.name: HEARTSTEEL
skinSets.description:
“HEARTSTEEL is the hottest new band on the scene, featuring artists like Kayn and Ezreal—”
“It's all of our band!”
“Calm down, Sett.”
“Wait, which magazine is this for again, K'Sante?”
“Please try to focus!”
“Hey Yone, can we just get on stage already?”
“We are—oh, well, Aphelios just walked off…”

skinSets.name: K/DA
skinSets.description: “There is a place between fantasy and reality where anything can happen. You have the power to be anyone, and do anything. It is your dream. In our in-between world, K/DA feels confident and strong. We can do anything, and so can you.” -Kai'Sa

skinSets.name: Pentakill
skinSets.description: In a world where heavy metal reigns supreme, PENTAKILL are the undisputed masters of melting the face right off your head. Six members, two penta-platinum albums, and the chrome-fisted fury of the gods themselves. It's time to rock!

skinSets.name: Pentakill III: The Lost Chapter
skinSets.description: In a realm consecrated to dark and uncaring gods, where mortals clash in ceaseless, bloody sagas of metal, one band rose above all others: Pentakill, chosen of the Noisome Host. Now revered in temples and arenas across the land, their supremacy has become absolute—though a time of change is approaching, and the cycle may soon begin anew...

skinSets.name: Popstar
skinSets.description: When you're at the top of the charts, no one can bring you down.

skinSets.name: True Damage
skinSets.description: “What is True Damage? Man, True Damage is the future! It's a collective of the best artists from around the world, coming together with the best collaboration, to make the best hip-hop music. We're five steps ahead of the game. Everyone else has gotta catch up.” -Ekko

universes.name: Victorious
universes.description: Champions conquer their enemies and ascend to new heights, achieving their wildest dreams and showing off their hard-earned spoils to any and all who want to look upon true greatness.

skinSets.name: Victorious
skinSets.description: Champions conquer their enemies and ascend to new heights, achieving their wildest dreams and showing off their hard-earned spoils to any and all who want to look upon true greatness.

universes.name: Honor
universes.description: Society has become increasingly individualistic and closed off under the Essent's rule. People are encouraged to care only about themselves, so nobody trusts each other. As leader of the long-dead Order of Solace, Malzahar seeks to bring harmony to this dissonant world through the uplifting aura of Solace. He knows that only by coming together can they inspire a better world.

skinSets.name: Three Honors
skinSets.description: Society has become increasingly individualistic and closed off under the Essent's rule. People are encouraged to care only about themselves, so nobody trusts each other. As leader of the long-dead Order of Solace, Malzahar seeks to bring harmony to this dissonant world through the uplifting aura of Solace. He knows that only by coming together can they inspire a better world.

universes.name: Heavy Metal
universes.description: Audiences gather from all over the world for a chance to witness the greatest robot fighters throw down in RiotCorp's gladiatorial arenas, eager for the chance to be crowned the Full Metal Robot Fighting League Champion or break down trying.

skinSets.name: Heavy Metal
skinSets.description: Audiences gather from all over the world for a chance to witness the greatest robot fighters throw down in RiotCorp's gladiatorial arenas, eager for the chance to be crowned the Full Metal Robot Fighting League Champion or break down trying.

universes.name: Be Mine
universes.description: So... will you?

skinSets.name: Heartbreakers
skinSets.description: Most seek out sweethearts in quiet parks or friendly tea shops. But those relationships never last. The bonds formed on the battlefield, piercing like bullets straight through the hearts of enemies... those endure.

universes.name: Academy
universes.description: ATTENTION STUDENTS AND FACULTY: It has come to our attention that all students are currently facing disiplinary action and all professors are on "suggested" psychiatric leave. Class will be canceled until further notice, perhaps a time when the aformentioned suspeded students have reexamined their abysmal behavior.

skinSets.name: Academy
skinSets.description: ATTENTION STUDENTS AND FACULTY: It has come to our attention that all students are currently facing disiplinary action and all professors are on "suggested" psychiatric leave. Class will be canceled until further notice, perhaps a time when the aformentioned suspeded students have reexamined their abysmal behavior.

universes.name: Arcanists
universes.description: Right outside the academy doors is a world filled with magic... and danger. The professors caution the young wizards and witches to stay within the safety of the school grounds, grow their power, and study well—but where is the fun in that when adventure awaits just beyond the bend?

skinSets.name: Arcanists
skinSets.description: Right outside the academy doors is a world filled with magic... and danger. The professors caution the young wizards and witches to stay within the safety of the school grounds, grow their power, and study well—but where is the fun in that when adventure awaits just beyond the bend?

universes.name: Star Voyagers
universes.description: It's dangerous to traverse space alone… take a meep! Unless it's purple. The purple ones are evil.

skinSets.name: Astronauts
skinSets.description: Astronauts, hijinks, and adorable alien meeps! Defying gravity is just another day for these adventurous space protectors, as they defend planet M33p and traverse the grand cosmos that awaits them.

skinSets.name: Invaders
skinSets.description: True to their title, these nefarious alien meeps have stumbled upon a power they don't quite understand. Unfortunately, misery loves company. Those who come into contact with the invaders almost always come out on the other side just a little more evil… and purple!

universes.name: God Weapon
universes.description: Scattered across the globe, the God Weapons morphed society into one driven by power. These sentient monuments call to those who are worthy and bestow their gifts upon their subjects, aiming to expand their conquest in this war-torn world. To be chosen is a badge of honor, instilling fear into any who may oppose them.

skinSets.name: Battle Academia
skinSets.description: At these institutions, only the strong survive. Though they were founded to honor their God Weapon, the students at each academy strive to make its strength their own on their path to glory. Whether it's the classroom, or the battlefield, dominate the competition.

universes.name: Beta
universes.description: beta_universe_descriptionFINALFINAL.txt

skinSets.name: Beta
skinSets.description: Who let these stay in the build???? Don't tell Legal.

universes.name: Blackfrost
universes.description: The Ice Witch lets none slumber; each fallen friend and foe in her domain rises anew to fight by her side. Her dark magic twists their appearance, creating glacial golems with hearts of black, unmelting ice.

skinSets.name: Blackfrost
skinSets.description: The Ice Witch lets none slumber; each fallen friend and foe in her domain rises anew to fight by her side. Her dark magic twists their appearance, creating glacial golems with hearts of black, unmelting ice.

universes.name: Bloodstone
universes.description: The fabled Bloodstone grants impressive abilities at an equally chilling price. Many bodies lie in its wake, with doubtless more to come, because there is no shortage of power within the darkness, only the will to seize it.

skinSets.name: Bloodstone
skinSets.description: Terrors abound in the depths of night, with none as fearsome as the Bloodstone cults. Shrieks fill the air in their presence, while the streets run red, for their master hungers and must be satiated.

universes.name: Esports
universes.description: Some say holding up the Summoner's Cup before a stadium of cheering fans is the greatest prize... others say it's the cash. The folks who make Skins on the League of Legends team? We think that the best part of winning Worlds is being immortalized in your favorite game. And we aren't biased!

skinSets.name: Challenger
skinSets.description: Commemorating the annual League of Legends season start.

skinSets.name: Conqueror
skinSets.description: Commemorating the League of Legends Mid-Season Invitational and Spring Split tournaments.

skinSets.name: World Champions: 2011
skinSets.description: Congratulations to your Worlds winners for 2011: Fnatic!

skinSets.name: World Champions: 2012
skinSets.description: Congratulations to your Worlds winners for 2012: Taipei Assassins!

skinSets.name: World Champions: 2013
skinSets.description: Congratulations to your Worlds winners for 2013: SK Telecom T1!

skinSets.name: World Champions: 2014
skinSets.description: Congratulations to your Worlds winners for 2014: Samsung White!

skinSets.name: World Champions: 2015
skinSets.description: Congratulations to your Worlds winners for 2015: SK Telecom T1!

skinSets.name: World Champions: 2016
skinSets.description: Congratulations to your Worlds winners for 2016: SK Telecom T1!

skinSets.name: World Champions: 2017
skinSets.description: Congratulations to your Worlds winners for 2017: Samsung Galaxy!

skinSets.name: World Champions: 2018
skinSets.description: Congratulations to your Worlds winners for 2018: Invictus Gaming!

skinSets.name: World Champions: 2019
skinSets.description: Congratulations to your Worlds winners for 2019: FunPlus Phoenix!
