skinSets.name: World Champions: 2020
skinSets.description: Congratulations to your Worlds winners for 2020: DAMWON Gaming!

skinSets.name: World Champions: 2021
skinSets.description: Congratulations to your Worlds winners for 2021: Edward Gaming!

skinSets.name: World Champions: 2023
skinSets.description: Congratulations to your Worlds winners for 2023: T1!

skinSets.name: World Championship
skinSets.description: The greatest stage in all of gaming. Two teams face off before millions of fans. Only one will be crowned the champion.

universes.name: Collector Edition
universes.description: For the discerning collector of limited edition MOBA releases in 2009.

skinSets.name: Collector's Edition
skinSets.description: Everything feels better when it comes inside a Collector's Edition box, be it digital or physical.

universes.name: War is Heck
universes.description: What is this?! We're in war, soldier, and you're spending your time reading? What use is reading when you're scooching your skinny butt through rat-infested mud in the middle of a hurricane under live fire? None, that's what! Now get in formation!

skinSets.name: Commando
skinSets.description: Just your average bottomless pit of scum and villainy. Bosses vie for power; pacts are made and broken; friendships meet their end on the edge of twisted, subtle knives. And yet, there's something more to this city. Something undiscovered, imperceptible. Something... infinite.

skinSets.name: Omega Squad
skinSets.description: When the war came, Omega Squad was sent to end it. Now only one of them remains, a yordle with no battles left to fight but his own...

universes.name: Cottontail
universes.description: It's rabbit season! Fine folk up and down the bunny trail are dressed in their bun-day best, eggs painted and smiles wide. Here's hoping their hopping helps you with holiday cheer!

skinSets.name: Cottontail
skinSets.description: It's rabbit season! Fine folk up and down the bunny trail are dressed in their bun-day best, eggs painted and smiles wide. Here's hoping their hopping helps you with holiday cheer!

universes.name: Crimson Elite
universes.description: How does one find the Crimson Elite? Follow the bodies.

skinSets.name: Crimson Elite
skinSets.description: We can neither confirm nor deny the Crimson Elite's involvement in any criminal activities and request all inquiries be directed to local authorities.

universes.name: Death Sworn
universes.description: The underworld stirs with ominous activity. Death marshals its subjects for a new plan of terrifying design, one that will require the souls of every mortal.

skinSets.name: Death Sworn
skinSets.description: Eager to claim more souls for the underworld, Death sends the souls of fallen warriors as Death Sworn back to the mortal plane, where they serve their master's terrible bidding with relish.

universes.name: Demonic
universes.description: To those poor souls condemned to suffering, whether bound by contract or practiced wickedness, the eternal fires of Hell will be waiting.

skinSets.name: Demonic
skinSets.description: Even in the kingdom of Hell, fervent personalities jockey for higher standing, gambling with the souls of mortals in their power plays for the dark lord's favor.

universes.name: Four Beasts
universes.description: Divine beasts watch over the world entire, capable of turning anyone into powerful beings, but only if that soul is worthy of their blessings. Whether their power is used for good or evil, once the gift is given, it cannot be taken away.

skinSets.name: Dragonmancers
skinSets.description: Majestic dragons dwell in remote places of wild beauty, avoiding mortal affairs outside of rarely bestowing their gifts on only a select few. The Dragonmancers are those fortunate and powerful enough to have gained the ultimate blessing. Whether they then use that for good or for evil is up to them, and anyone strong enough to stop them.

skinSets.name: Phoenixmancers
skinSets.description: Only the truest hearts are blessed by the divine fenghuang, a legendary phoenix who watches over the world. Her champions receive a single feather—each one containing unimaginable elemental power, granting them the means needed to protect all that is innocent and good from forces lurking in the shadows.

universes.name: Dreadknights
universes.description: Brought back to life by mysterious ancient magic, these undead knights are the only remnants of a storied history, lost to time. They'll protect what once was theirs, at any cost to mortal life.

skinSets.name: Dreadknights
skinSets.description: Brought back to life by mysterious ancient magic, these undead knights are the only remnants of a storied history, lost to time. They'll protect what once was theirs, at any cost to mortal life.

universes.name: Riftquest
universes.description: Danger lurks in the land of Runeterra! Powerful monsters, dastardly sorcerers, and mythical creatures roam unchecked! Gather your friends and create your own adventure for 3-5 players, vanquishing evil with each roll of the die. Do you have what it takes to save the world, and become a legend of RIFTQUEST?

skinSets.name: Rift Quest
skinSets.description: Danger lurks in the land of Runeterra! Powerful monsters, dastardly sorcerers, and mythical creatures roam unchecked! Gather your friends and create your own adventure for 3-5 players, vanquishing evil with each roll of the die. Do you have what it takes to save the world, and become a legend of RIFTQUEST?
